content:
Hello folks, how's life? :wave: I'm looking forward to helping in easy and small tasks, learning more about Rust along the way by doing. I still haven't finished reading the whole book, but instead I have a bunch of tiny pet projects in Rust, from synthesizer VSTs to a wc clone, adventofcode exercise solutions, and others. I'm currently pursuing MSc in CS, taking some programming languages & compilers courses soon to get more insight into what happens under the hood. I'm also working as a backend engineer, with a history of fullstack dev, devops, sysadmin, IT support, etc.
You can find me as Walther on here, on many of the Discords, GitHub, and as @anotherwalther on Twitter.
